ygData.subject: Re: Guide on brewing
ygData.msgSnippet: Err, I thot INT will only affect the rate u train in a skill but not the ceiling.  I dun think Sereph s bard INT is high, but he can make it to 138 skills in 2
ygData.messageBody:
Err, I thot INT will only affect the rate u train in a skill but not the
ceiling. I dun think Sereph's bard INT is high, but he can make it to 138
skills in 2 hrs time. My wiz can also reach ceiling at 135, within 2 hrs
too. Seem like the biggest gap for ceiling is between 135 and 138. But
anything lower than 100, heheh...

Ziltus
